text:
pUrvapaqkShE suqtyA saM pa#dyatE pUrvapaqkShaM mAsA# aqBi saM pa#dyantEq tE pU$rvapaqkSha ut ti#ShThantiq tAnuqttiShTha#taq OSha#dhayOq vanaqspataqyO&nUt ti#ShThantiq tAn ka#lyAqNI kIqrtiranUt ti#ShThaqtyarA$th suriqmE yaja#mAnAq itiq tadanuq sarvE# rAddhnuvanti || 30
(Eqta - cCaqbaMTku#rvantiq tEShAqM - catu#stri(gm)Sacca) (A8)
